raid7SysVersion.name: raid7SysVersion
raid7SysVersion.description: Describes the revision level of the running RAID7 Operating System; this is not really an IP address - but the revision is expressed as 4 decimal numbers so the IpAddress type is convenient.

raid7TotalMem.name: raid7TotalMem
raid7TotalMem.description: The number of kilobytes of memory present

raid7GoodMem.name: raid7GoodMem
raid7GoodMem.description: The number of kilobytes of memory judged good by self-test

raid7MemAvail.name: raid7MemAvail
raid7MemAvail.description: The number of kilobytes of memory currently in use.

raid7CacheHitPercent.name: raid7CacheHitPercent
raid7CacheHitPercent.description: The system-wide percentage of operations satisfied from the RAID7 system cache. This does not include any operations satisfied from cache in channel adapters, or cache built into the physical drives.

raid7BlockTable.name: raid7BlockTable
raid7BlockTable.description: This table shows how the host transfer block sizes have been distributed - it can be used to tune system performance (see the RAID 7 User Guide).

raid7BlockEntry.name: raid7BlockEntry
raid7BlockEntry.description: Information specific to blocks of a given size.

raid7NumBlocks.name: raid7NumBlocks
raid7NumBlocks.description: Number of blocks of this size.

raid7NumHostChannels.name: raid7NumHostChannels
raid7NumHostChannels.description: The number of functional Host I/O Channels.

raid7ChannelTable.name: raid7ChannelTable
raid7ChannelTable.description: A table describing each of the Host I/O Channels

raid7ChannelEntry.name: raid7ChannelEntry
raid7ChannelEntry.description: Information specific to a given Host I/O Channel

raid7ChannelNumber.name: raid7ChannelNumber
raid7ChannelNumber.description: The number of this Host I/O Channel

raid7ChannelTransferRate.name: raid7ChannelTransferRate
raid7ChannelTransferRate.description: A measure of the data transfer speed on this channel during recent transfers (does not include the idle time on the channel between transfers in the calculation).

raid7ChannelTransactionRate.name: raid7ChannelTransactionRate
raid7ChannelTransactionRate.description: A measure of the number I/O operations per second on this channel.

raid7ChannelErrorMsgs.name: raid7ChannelErrorMsgs
raid7ChannelErrorMsgs.description: The number of error messages on this channel; see the RAID7 console and the User Guide.

raid7ChannelLastKey.name: raid7ChannelLastKey
raid7ChannelLastKey.description: The most recently reported SCSI Key value

raid7NumDrives.name: raid7NumDrives
raid7NumDrives.description: The number of drives installed in the RAID7 system

raid7NumDataDrives.name: raid7NumDataDrives
raid7NumDataDrives.description: The number of drives being used as data drives; this may not be equal to the total of the drives in the following objects.

raid7NumParityDrives.name: raid7NumParityDrives
raid7NumParityDrives.description: The number of drives being used to store parity information.

raid7NumStandbyDrives.name: raid7NumStandbyDrives
raid7NumStandbyDrives.description: The number of drives available for reconstructing data from a failed drive.

raid7NumFailedDrives.name: raid7NumFailedDrives
raid7NumFailedDrives.description: The number of drives whos raid7DriveState is either reconstructing or failed.

raid7DriveTable.name: raid7DriveTable
raid7DriveTable.description: A list of drive entries, one for each physical drive; this may be a sparse table.

raid7DriveEntry.name: raid7DriveEntry
raid7DriveEntry.description: Information specific to a single drive.

raid7DriveActivity.name: raid7DriveActivity
raid7DriveActivity.description: This is letter indicating the most recent operation reported for the drive. See the RAID7 User Guide for values and thier meanings.

raid7DriveWrites.name: raid7DriveWrites
raid7DriveWrites.description: Number of write operations to this drive.

raid7DriveReads.name: raid7DriveReads
raid7DriveReads.description: Number of read operations to this drive; does not include operations satisfied from RAID7 system or channel cache, but does include those satisfied from any cache within the drive.

raid7DriveTimeOuts.name: raid7DriveTimeOuts
raid7DriveTimeOuts.description: The number of SCSI operations timed out on the drive.

raid7DriveErrors.name: raid7DriveErrors
raid7DriveErrors.description: Number of errors reported by the drive

raid7DriveUp.name: raid7DriveUp
raid7DriveUp.description: This trap is sent whenever the state for a drive changes to data or parity from any other value. An equivalent poll would be to poll raid7NumberDrives and raid7FailedDrives and then read the raid7DriveTable when one of them changes.

raid7DriveDown.name: raid7DriveDown
raid7DriveDown.description: This trap is sent whenever the state for a drive changes from data or parity to any other value. An equivalent poll would be to poll raid7NumberDrives and raid7FailedDrives and then read the raid7DriveTable when one of them changes.

raid7EnvironmentStatus.name: raid7EnvironmentStatus
raid7EnvironmentStatus.description: The 'failure' indicates that one or more power supplies or fans in the unit have failed.

raid7EnvironmentFailure.name: raid7EnvironmentFailure
raid7EnvironmentFailure.description: This trap is sent when the value of raid7EnvironmentStatus changes to failure.
